name: Super Mega Robit: Shoot Bang!
description:
Submission for GMTK 2019 game jam with the theme "only one."

Play as the ever powerful robit "J-2" and shoot bang explode your way through waves of bad robits! Your gunshots are much stronger than theirs, but as a result, they destroy the gun. In this twin-stick-shooter, enemies explode into guns that you'll wanna pick up and shoot to explode even more enemies!

To help you out a bit, you can hold two weapons, like holding two blocks in Tetris! 

Tip: Walk over guns to pick them up.

Controls:

FOR KEYBOARD:

Movement: WASD

Aim: Mouse

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Hold: Space

FOR CONTROLLER:

Movement: Left Analogue Stick

Aim: Right Analogue Stick

Shoot: Right Trigger

Hold: Right Bumper
